parameters.subject: Re: 'Citibank=037-575-651'
parameters.text:
=Hi Team,

Please find the requested info as below along the my attached statement from bank.

1.    Reason for excess payment
Reply - As payment was huge (4+ Lakh) and I have paid in multiple ways so by mistake I have paid extra 1 Lakh.

2.    Mode of payment
Reply - Through Paytm as well as Cred

3.    Account number
Reply - 60601504071

4.    Account name
Reply - Santosh Sah 

5.    Bank Name
Reply - ICICI Bank

6.    Branch and location
Reply - Salkia, Howrah

7.    Account Type: (Savings / Current)
Reply - Savings

8.    IFSC code
Reply - ICIC0001606


- Kindly confirm if the payment was initiated as a direct transfer from a bank account or any application such as Cred app/PhonePe, etc.
Reply - It was done from Paytm App (113839.00) and also through Cred (100000.00), So i need this extra 1 Lakh to my account.

-Valid debit proof (An account statement with entry of the debit details and the source account number Via PDF)
Reply - Kindly check the attachement in this mail.

I need the excess money to my ICICI bank as my mistake I have paid extra amount. So I give my consent for getting/reversing the 1 lakh (which is extra) back to my account.

I would like to request you to kindly process this request as soon possible.

Thanks,
Santosh


_____________________________________________________________

Hi Mr. Shah,  
 
This is with reference to your email dated October 12, 2023. 
 
We understand that you wish to have the credit balance refund on your card account and want us to assist on the same.
 
We would like to inform you that in-order to transfer the excess balance, we require details of the source account from which we have received the latest payment on the card.
Request you to share the following source account details at the earliest or latest before 5 working days of the next bill cycle.
1.    Reason for excess payment
2.    Mode of payment
3.    Account number
4.    Account name
5.    Bank Name
6.    Branch and location
7.    Account Type: (Savings / Current)
8.    IFSC code
- Kindly confirm if the payment was initiated as a direct transfer from a bank account or any application such as Cred app/PhonePe, etc.
-Valid debit proof (An account statement with entry of the debit details and the source account number Via PDF)
Upon receipt of the required information, I assure that we will refund the available excess credit to the source account (bank account or the application) from which we have received the payment.
Also, we request you to share explicit consent for us to transfer excess balance to your source account.
